attributes.additional_details:
Royal Marines have been ordered to fight in Afghanistan because the Political Process failed. This is the 4th time that UK have failed in this Psychotic State. Are we really surprised when the brutality of the theatre in which they operate infects our front line troops?
This is not a moment for providing a scapegoat to placate a corrupt fanatical regime.
 It is not a moment to ruin a loyal UK patriot.
 It is not a moment to pacify a World Opinion that isn't really interested.
Release and re-instate Sgt Blackman...He was doing what his political masters, who have woefully failed in their job, ordered him to do.
